description: Single storey rear extension; rear roof extension; installation of four rooflights to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 240.PL01 Location Plan; 240.PL02 Block Plan; 240.001 Existing GA Ground Floor; 240.002 Existing GA First Floor; 240.003 Existing GA Loft; 240.004 Existing GA Roof Plan; 240.005 Existing GA Section AA; 240.006 Existing GA Sectional Elevation BB; 240.008 Existing GA Rear Elevation; 240.009 Existing Front Elevation; 240.011 Proposed GA Ground Floor; 240.012 Proposed GA First Floor; 240.013 Proposed GA Second Floor; 240.014 Proposed GA Roof Plan; 240.015 Proposed GA Section AA; 240.016 Proposed GA Sectional Elevation BB; 240.018 Proposed Front Elevation; 240.018 Proposed Elevations Front and Rear; 240.019 Proposed Elevation Side/North Wall; Planning Statement prepared by Nissen Design.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7A and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013). | The proposed rooflights on the front roof slope hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
